title: The Case of Barbara Parsons
creator_credit: Morten Parker, Rob Iveson, Labor Canada and Parker Film Associates
brief_description: Barbara Parsons, a recent employee, is promoted to a position ahead of Michael Blais a company employee of 19 years. Dramatizes a situation that could occur in any unionized workplace - the violation of a contract between management and labour and illustrates the four main steps of the grievance procedure.
creator_credit_for_label: Morten Parker, Rob Iveson, Labor Canada and Parker Film Associates
